00169 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00170 int TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::FindLocalIndex(const KeyType& key) const
00171 {
00172        typename IndicesMap::const_iterator iter = m_positionsMap.find(key);
00173        if (iter != m_positionsMap.end()){
00174               return iter->second;
00175        }
00176 
00177        return -1;
00178 }

00248 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00249 bool TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::InsertLocal(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& value)
00250 {
00251        typename IndicesMap::const_iterator iter = m_positionsMap.find(key);
00252        if (iter != m_positionsMap.end()){
00253               return false;
00254        }
00255 
00256        int newIndex = int(m_pairList.size());
00257        m_positionsMap[key] = newIndex;
00258 
00259        m_pairList.push_back(Pair(key, value));
00260 
00261        return true;
00262 }

00269        m_pairList.clear();

00273 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00274 void TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::GetLocalKeys(Keys& result, bool doAppend) const
00275 {
00276        if (!doAppend){
00277               result.clear();
00278        }
00279 
00280        for (         typename IndicesMap::const_iterator iter = m_positionsMap.begin();
00281                             iter != m_positionsMap.end();
00282                             ++iter){
00283               result.insert(iter->first);
00284        }
00285 }

00290 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00291 int TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::GetElementsCount() const
00292 {
00293        if (m_parentPtr != NULL){
00294               return m_parentPtr->GetElementsCount() + GetLocalElementsCount();
00295        }
00296        else{
00297               return GetLocalElementsCount();
00298        }
00299 }

00302 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00303 typename TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::ValueType& TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::operator[](const KeyType& key)
00304 {
00305        typename IndicesMap::const_iterator iter = m_positionsMap.find(key);
00306        if (iter != m_positionsMap.end()){
00307               return m_pairList[iter->second].second;
00308        }
00309 
00310        int newIndex = int(m_pairList.size());
00311        m_positionsMap[key] = newIndex;
00312 
00313        m_pairList.push_back(Pair(key, ValueType()));
00314 
00315        return m_pairList.back().second;
00316 }

00326 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00327 int TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::FindIndex(const KeyType& key) const
00328 {
00329        typename IndicesMap::const_iterator iter = m_positionsMap.find(key);
00330        if (iter != m_positionsMap.end()){
00331               return iter->second;
00332        }
00333 
00334        if (m_parentPtr != NULL){
00335               int parentIndex = m_parentPtr->FindIndex(key);
00336               if (parentIndex >= 0){
00337                      return parentIndex + GetLocalElementsCount();
00338               }
00339        }
00340 
00341        return -1;
00342 }

00345 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00346 const typename TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::ValueType* TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::FindElement(const KeyType& key) const
00347 {
00348        int index = FindIndex(key);
00349        if (index >= 0){
00350               return &GetValueAt(index);
00351        }
00352 
00353        return NULL;
00354 }

00357 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00358 void TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::GetKeys(Keys& result, bool doAppend) const
00359 {
00360        GetLocalKeys(result, doAppend);
00361 
00362        if (m_parentPtr != NULL){
00363               m_parentPtr->GetKeys(result, true);
00364        }
00365 }

00367 
00368 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00369 const typename TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::KeyType& TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::GetKeyAt(int index) const
00370 {
00371        int elementsCount = GetLocalElementsCount();
00372        if (index < elementsCount){
00373               return GetLocalKeyAt(index);
00374        }
00375 
00376        I_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);     // Index from outside this map!
00377 
00378        return m_parentPtr->GetKeyAt(index - elementsCount);
00379 }
00380 
00381 
00382 template <typename Key, typename Value>
00383 const typename TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::ValueType& TCascadedMap<Key, Value>::GetValueAt(int index) const
00384 {
00385        int elementsCount = GetLocalElementsCount();
00386        if (index < elementsCount){
00387               return GetLocalValueAt(index);
00388        }
00389 
00390        I_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);     // Index from outside this map!
00391 
00392        return m_parentPtr->GetValueAt(index - elementsCount);
00393 }
